list.title: Full resolution
list.description: Share your photos in full resolution in their original quality.

list.title: Premium privacy
list.description: No ads, no tracking and secure storage: the advantages of an independent company benefit everyone.

list.title: Free for the first year
list.description: No subscriptions, no storage limits: Premium features are paid once and kept forever. During the first year of usage, all albums are Premium for free!

list.title: AirDrop, but for groups
list.description: Apart from Android support, Echo Photos has many advantages compared to AirDrop. With smart download tools, never accidentally download your photos again!

list.title: Refined design
list.description: A carefully crafted app: Simple and yet feature-rich, letting you focus on what you want to do.

list.title: Social sharing
list.description: Comments and likes for your group images: Echo provides a private social network experience. For real friends only.
